Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return PolicyYou may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Price: $1,399.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:23:43 UTC – Details)


CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master series is a line of gaming PCs powered by AMD’s newest Ryzen CPU and accompanying AM4 architecture. The Ryzen 5 CPU is the core to the series with fast processing speeds and up to 6 cores / 12 threads for effortless multi-tasking. The Gamer Master also includes the latest AMD Radeon or NVIDIA’s GeForce series of graphics cards to deliver high frame rates and impeccable image quality in the newest PC games.
System: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G 3.9GHz 6-Core | AMD B550 Chipset | 16GB DDR4 | 500GB NVMe SSD | 2TB HDD
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 8GB Video Card | 1x HDMI | 2x DisplayPort
Connectivity: 6 x USB 3.1 | 2 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | 802.11AC Wi-Fi | Audio: 7.1 Channel | Keyboard and mouse
Special feature: Tempered glass side case panel | Custom RGB case lighting | RGB 7 colors gaming mouse
1 year parts & labor | Free lifetime tech support





About CyberPowerPC:

CyberPowerPC gaming systems are the choice of top gamers everywhere, from pro esports players to pro streamers. However, although it’s used by the best, it’s built for any and every gamer out there. We challenge you to Get On Our Level. Let us give you the tools to take you to top. Every game you dominate, every level you smash, every competition you win, we want to be a part of that every step of the way.

  • Intel Marketing Partner of the Year 2020.
  • Microsoft US Partner of the Year 2020.

CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master – AMD Series

Enthusiast Level Gaming Computer System

CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master series is a line of gaming PCs powered by AMD’s newest Ryzen CPU and accompanying AM4 architecture. The Ryzen 5 CPU is the core to the series with fast processing speeds and up to 6 cores / 12 threads for effortless multi-tasking. The Gamer Master also includes the latest AMD Radeon or NVIDIA’s GeForce series of graphics cards to deliver high frame rates and impeccable image quality in the newest PC games.

  • VR Ready with HTC VIVE and Oculus Rift.
  • Optimized for gaming at Ultra High game settings and high resolutions.
  • AMD Ryzen Processor
  • Performance NVIDIA Graphics Processor
  • Wireless 802.11 AC Wi-Fi
  • Gaming Keyboard and RGB 7 Color Mouse Combo

DELL 7050MT is a Mini Tower computer. This device is easy to upgrade with additional RAM and storage but have little to no expandability. Usually models with this chassis have an optional Wi-Fi and Bluetooth module and an M.2 slot for an SSD.
Features: 

CPU: Intel Quad Core i7-7700 3.60GHz to 4.20GHz, 4 cores, 8 threads
CPU Cache: 8 MB

Operating system: Windows 10 Pro

Memory: 32GB DDR4

Hard Drive: New 1TB NVMe SSD + 2TB HDD

Video Card: N/A

USB 3.0 Ports: 6
USB 2.0 Ports: 4

Display Port: 2

VGA Port: 0

HDMI: 1

Ethernet: x1 Lan Port

Serial Port: 0

WIFI &Bluetooth:Built-in WIFI & Bluetooth

Mouse/Keyboard:Wireless Keyboard & Mouse
What’s Included:
1 x DELL 7050 Tower Desktop
1 x Brand New Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo
1 x Power Cord
Powerful 7th Gen Processor – The DELL 7050 Tower computer driven by the Intel Core 7th Generation i7-7700 Processor (4 Core, 8 Threads, 8MB, 3.60GHz, Up to 4.20GHz) enables increased power and productivity.
Microsoft Windows 10 Pro – This DELL Tower Computer Pre-installed with the Windows 10 Professional operating system.
Superior memory – Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, Oversized 32GB DDR4 memory with Strictly selected particles.
Brand New 1TB M.2 NVMe Solid State Drive – The DELL 7050 Tower Computer comes with Brand New 1TB M.2 NVMe SSD to store important files and applications, support more faster Boot speed and faster storage rates.
Video Ports – This DELL 7050 Tower comes with 6x USB 3.0, 4x USB 2.0, 2 x display ports. Wireless keyboard & mouse are included.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $149.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:28:48 UTC – Details)

From the brand

High-Speed processor—— CHUWI HeroBox Windows Mini PC features Intel Celeron J4125 low-power processor, 4 cores and 4 threads, Turbo frequency 2.7GHz, which is offers more powerful performance, brings you more smooth and wonderful user experience,and offers you smooth operation and stable multitasking experience.
8GB RAM And 256GB ROM—— Built-in 8GB LPDDR4X, 256GB SSD, supports 512GB Micro SD extension, 512GB TF card,2TB M.2 2280 SSD,2TB 2.5-inch SATA HDD.Multi-task switching speed is extremely fast and no need to wait for application loading, especially in Microsoft Office software.
4K@60Hz Display —— CHUWI HeroBox mini computer adopt Intel UHD Graphics 600 comes with 12 execution, which had 4K ultra high definition streaming capability giving you a best-in-class television experience with true-to-life picture quality, which can be used as a media center to enjoy TV shows or games.The ability to connect with 2 monitors with HD2.0 & VGA outport greatly improves work efficiency.
High-Speed Network—— HeroBox mini gaming pc supports 2.4G+5G dual band WiFi and Bluetooth 4.2 which could be connected with your multimedia devices, mouse, acoustics or headset. with RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet, providing you a stable connection at higher speed. Fanless design, no noise no dust, ensure you a quiet and comfortable experience.
Bring Convenient to Your Life —— All important connections are available:1* Type-C,1* VGA, 1* HDMI 2.0, 1* Gigabit Ethernet , 2* USB 2.0, 2* USB 3.0, 1 * Micro SD Card Port, 1 * Headphone Port. 7.45.41.5 inches compact body only 0.97L,It can be put in a bag and taken away at any time. support to installed on back of the monitor or TV via VESA mount , tidy and space-saving.

  • Faster Running Speed —— CHUWI HeroBox Mini PC equips with 64-bit windows 10 Intel Celeron J4125 Quad-Core Quad-Threaded processor. And loaded with 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, 256GB SSD ROM. Powerful hardware makes it run more smoothly and stable.
  • Expand Storage by Multi-ways —— This Mini Desktop Computers support SATA HDD ( up to 2TB ) and TF card ( up to 512GB）, it comes with 2*USB 2.0 ports, 2 *USB 3.0 ports and Type-c. VGA and HD port are also availble, and the HD port can output 4K@60FPS video.
  • Greatly Improve Transmission Frequency —— HeroBox windows 10 mini pc adopts the latest wireless connectivity with Dual-Band 2.4G+5G Wi-Fi, it offers speeds up to 450Mbps on the 2.4GHz band & 1300Mbps on the 5GHz.
  • Effective Heat Dissipation —— Thermal conductive aluminum alloy are used on HeroBox to ensure continuous effective cooling in all directions. The power-saving HeroBox stays efficient and stable even after long period of work. Continuous 4-hour in use, it stays 34℃.
  • Great Home Theater PC —— CHUWI HeroBox Mirco pc with resolution up to 4096*2160@60Hz and plays 4K video smoothly, giving you a best television experience with true-to-life picture quality,which can be used as a media center to enjoy TV shows or games.
  • Place Anywhere As You Wish —— Install the HeroBox on the back of the monitor or TV via VESA international standard interface to make it an All-In-One PC. Mini body won’t take up tons of desk space and you can simply just slip it into your pocket and travel with it all the time.
  • It Is A Power Saver —— The HeroBox portable pc is intended to be energy-efficient straight out of the box. It packs with energy-efficient hardware components that work closely with the operating system to maintain the overall power consumption lower than 10 watts .
  • Authorized Windows 10 OS/Linux —— Authorized Windows 10 system was pre-installed on HeroBox tower pc, and it tackles down all kinds of tasks with high efficiency. Linux system is also supported to handle more applications use at ease.

Product Description

Conscious design

Advanced performance and productivity

Available with Intel Core i5 processors, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, The OptiPlex 9010 enables increased power and productivity. Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Large internal space

Dual “3.5” internal drive bays supporting multiple hard disk drives capable of RAID configurations. This PC comes with 2T HDD so that you can store more.

Specifications Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 3.4 GHz Turbo 3.8 GHz Memory: 16GB DDR3 Storage: 2T HDD Optical driver: DVD Port: USB 3.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 9010 like DP ports, a VGA port, a DP to HDMI adapter and an RJ-45 connection.Support Multi Monitor connection.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 3nd Gen Intel Core i5-3570 3.4 GHz up to 3.8 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 9010 for each user’s needs.

Upgrade Bay

The OptiPlex 9010 comes with DVD drive supports reading and DVD data.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit Multi-Language English/French/Spanish Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

DDR3 high-performance memory

Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, Oversized 16G DDR3 memory with Strictly selected particles.

2T hard disk drive

The OptiPlex 9010 comes with a 2T HDD so that you can store more photos, music and movies.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 9010 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

POWERFUL PROCESSOR – Your computer will be built with Intel’s top of the line Core i5 series processor so you can expect lightning fast, reliable and consistent performance and an exceptional PC experience.
SUPERIOR STORAGE AND MEMORY – Packed with ample solid state and hard drive space so you can store apps, games, photos, music and movies. Loaded with plenty of DDR3 RAM to help you zip through your tasks in a hurry and outperform the competition in any situation.
WINDOWS 10 LATEST RELEASE – We have added a brand new, fresh installation of Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit. It includes the new Microsoft Certificate of Authenticity (COA) and the Product Key.
MULTITASKING – You won’t have any issues with your regular day-to-day browsing with the featured 8GB DDR3 memory suited for multitasking power.
RENEWED – We follow strict requirements established for the MAR program by Microsoft. These requirements are designed to ensure that you receive a high quality and professionally refurbished computer.

Price: $299.95 - $183.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:33:54 UTC – Details)

Product Description

WHY CHOOSE OUVISLITE GK3V MINI PC?

1) Trustworthy Quality

We use Intel Celeron J4125 quad-core chip, DDR4 and M.2 SSD for more stable and smoother experience, OUVISLITE GK3V Mini PC will show you the performance of small form factor PC in all aspects.

2) Mature Mold Design

GK3V Mini PC has a high-quality appearance and compact component layout. With the unique air inlet and outlet design, it can dissipate heat more effectively. The snap-on cover design lets you view or upgrade internal components in one step.

3) 4K HD Visual Feast

Equipped with Intel Graphics 600 GPU, let’s reject monotonous color experience from now on, making home theater worthy of its name.

4) Triple Display Support

Dual HDMI plus VGA realizes the same and different display on three screens, you can expand the working space to multiple monitors, allowing you to gain a more efficient and comfortable productivity experience.

5) Energy Saving and Using Friendly

The TDP for the CPU is a very economical 10 Watts, more energy saving and low consumption. Noise tested at 35 decibels, avoiding the noise pollution of the mainframe.

Interface Details

2 x HDMI Ports1 x VGA Port2 x USB 3.0 Ports2 x USB 2.0 Ports1 x 1000Mbs LAN Port1 x 3.5mm Audio jack

OUVISLITE GK3V Mini PC Specification

Mini Desktop Computer

CPU: Intel Celeron Processor J4125

Processor Base Frequency: 2.00 GHz

Processor Burst Frequency: 2.70 GHz

Cores: 4

Threads: 4

Cache: 4MB

GPU: Intel UHD Graphics 600(Up to 750Mhz)

Memory Types: 12GB DDR4

Storage Types: 256GB M.2 SSD

Faster with Intel J4125 CPU

Equiped with powerful and high cost-effective CPU, the mini pc has decent performace and better than J3455 or J4205. Run Photoshop and other office software smoothly and handle multitasking easily.

Triple Screen Display

With dual HDMI ports and a VGA port, the mini computer easily realizes three-screen simultaneous display or different display. Which will greatly doubles your productivity and Enhance your office experience.

Small but Powerful

Designed with 5.11 x 5.11 x 1.96 inch small form factor size, which is only the size of a palm. And the weight of 1.87lb, so you can take it anywhere easily. Say good bye to bukly mainframes.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q1: Already installed Windows 11 Pro?

Yes, the GK3V comes pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro and You are free to use other operating systems such as Linux, Ubuntu. If you are accustomed to using the Windows 10 version, please contact OUVISLITE to obtain the Windows 10 Pro system installation file.

Q2: Don’t have a product key in the box or email of the mini pc you purchased?

We have activated our Windows product key for you. Right click on the blank space to enter properties, then you can view your product key. It is not safe to send product key in the package or email. The key is already used to activate your Windows, so it cannot be used on other computers.

Q3: Is the machine noisy when running?

To cool the machine, the GK3V Mini PC only produces about 35 decibels of fan sound when fully loaded. Most of the time it’s within the normal range. If you are bothered by machine noise, please inform OUVISLITE.

Q4: How can I enable multiscreen?

After connecting the HDMI cable or VGA cable to the screen, right-click on the desktop to enter the display settings, and then detect and identify more monitors.

Note:

To avoid waiting for system loading, please don’t connect to the network when you first use the Mini PC until you Fully entet into windows system desktop.

OUVISLITE MINI PC support other ways to extend storage:

2.5 inch SATA SSD/HDD up to 2TB(Not include).Replace a M.2 SATA HDD.Add removable hard drives to expand the storage.

Storage expansion to meet your needs for storing more applications, work files, Audio files and videos.

【Meet to Sufficient Memory Storage】This mini pc achieves 12GB memory capacity with dual-channel DDR4 and comes with 256GB of storage. While ensuring cost-effective, the larger capacity brings you a better multitasking experience. Newbie friendly storage upgrade support:1)2.5 inch SATA SSD/HDD up to 2TB(not include). 2)replace the M.2 SATA SSD. Expand your applications, files, video or audio freely.
【J4125 Mini PC Windows 11 Pro】Celeron Gemini Lake J4125 Quad-Core processor with base frequency of 2.0 GHz and up to 2.7 GHz in burst. Let the minis to run multiple applications, web pages, full HD video or office software smoothly. Windows 11 preinstalled and automatically activated after connecting to the Internet, plug and play!
【Enjoy Immersive Visual Experience】The desktop computer has 2 HDMI ports and 1 VGA port for triple screen output, supporting three-screen simultaneous display or different display. The combination with HD Graphics 600 (up to 750MHz) makes work more efficient, 4K@60Hz HD brings you a visual feast. Whether you use it as a home pc or a business pc, it can meet your more personalized needs.
【Wireless Technology and Smart Fan】This mini computer built in 2.4G/5G dual band WiFi and Bluetooth 4.2, which could be easily and stably connected to wireless keyboard, mouse, speaker, etc. Low noise heat sink fan design means more efficient heat dissipation, providing a cooler and quieter working environment for the computer.
【Stylish Design and Ample Interfaces】The front face of the machine has an indicator light, and the snap-on cover design makes it easy to expand storage. Anti-slip rubber feet to avoid scratching the desktop. With 5.11 x 5.11 x 1.96 inch small body, it also equiped with 2 x USB 3.0 ports, 2 x USB 2.0 ports, 1 x 1000Mbs LAN port,1 x 3.5mm Audio jack，2 x HDMI, 1 x VGA to meet diverse needs.
【OUVISLITE is Always There for You】GK3V desktop pc supports Auto Power on / Wake on LAN / PXE / RTC Wake / 7X24 Hours Operation. These design features will bring you convenience and consideration at any time in life. We also provide a satisfaction and lifetime consulting services for you, please feel free to contact us if you have any problem in use.

Know You, Know Life Better

No matter where you want to go, where you are.
